backend/main.mo: Motoko backend actor defining types (Driver, Trip, Payment, Payout, BankTransfer, MobilePayment, CryptoWallet) and functions for payment processing, commission calculation, bank transfers, mobile payments, and crypto wallet transactions with in-memory Map storage.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting three deployment-related features: retry deployment, preview mode fallback, and downloadable package generation, with associated files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend TypeScript/React components, hooks, utilities, and configuration files describing their purpose and functionality.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with root div and module script loading main.tsx for the AFO Ride Driver application.
Comprehensive deployment guide covering prerequisites, package contents, local development setup, and deployment instructions for the AFO Ride Driver application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component managing splash screen, preview mode banner, dashboard rendering, and download package button, wrapped in theme and React Query providers.
frontend/src/components/BottomNav.tsx: Fixed bottom navigation bar with five tabs (Home, Wallet, Safety, Profile, Support) for switching between main application sections.
frontend/src/components/Dashboard.tsx: Main dashboard container managing tab state and rendering appropriate content (DriverStats, WalletSection, SafetySection, ProfileSection, SupportSection) based on active tab.
Floating download button that generates and downloads a text file with package information and deployment instructions.
frontend/src/components/DriverStats.tsx: Dashboard cards displaying driver online/offline status toggle, today's earnings, weekly earnings, rating, and wallet balance.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Fixed header displaying AFO Ride logo and demo driver information (John Doe).
frontend/src/components/PreviewMode.tsx: Alert banner component displayed at the top of the screen indicating the application is running in preview/demo mode.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSection.t: Displays driver profile information including personal details, vehicle information, and verified documents with a logout button. Uses hardcoded mock data for demonstration.
frontend/src/components/RideRequest.tsx: Modal component for handling ride requests with accept/reject actions and ride lifecycle management (start/end). Shows pickup/drop locations, fare, and distance with state-based UI transitions.
frontend/src/components/SafetySection.ts: Safety features UI with SOS emergency button, security/bouncer request, emergency contacts, and live location sharing. Includes night mode safety notification.
frontend/src/components/SplashScreen.tsx: Loading screen component displaying the AFO Ride logo with animated dots and pulsing effects during app initialization.
frontend/src/components/SupportSection.t: Support interface with call/WhatsApp contact buttons and issue reporting form with textarea. Shows 24/7 support availability message.
frontend/src/components/TransactionHisto: Displays recent transaction history fetched from backend using useGetAllTransactions hook. Shows payment method, timestamp, amount, and status with loading skeletons.
frontend/src/components/WalletSection.ts: Wallet management UI showing available balance, withdrawal form, and incentives/bonuses display. Uses local state for withdrawal amount input.
frontend/src/config/environment.ts: Environment configuration utilities to detect preview/demo mode via URL parameters or environment variables and determine development/production status.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and manages the backend actor instance with Internet Identity authentication, automatically invalidating dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication on ICP, managing login state, identity persistence, and delegation validation with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching transactions and app statistics from the backend actor, with error handling and conditional execution based on actor availability.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark themes, defining colors for UI components using OKLCH color space.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers around the main App component.
frontend/src/utils/packageBuilder.ts: Utility functions that generate package metadata and README content for distributing the AFO Ride Driver application with deployment instructions.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom theme extensions including OKLCH color system, container settings, animations, and plugin integrations for typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing AFO Ride Driver as a mobile-first driver app demo with registration, ride management, earnings tracking, safety features, and admin dashboard capabilities.
